titles.title: A concurrent resolution relative to Taiwan's Membership in the United Nations.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3532)
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 3/23/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the people of Taiwan deserve to be represented in the United Nations and in other international organizations by appointees representing Taiwan's Government.
